dorks.title: PHP extension w/ parameters
dorks.google: site:example.com ext:php inurl:?
dorks.bing: site:example.com ext:php url:?

dorks.title: API Endpoints
dorks.google: site:example.com inurl:api | site:*/rest | site:*/v1 | site:*/v2 | site:*/v3
dorks.bing: site:example.com (url:api OR url:rest OR url:v1 OR url:v2 OR url:v3)
dorks.duckduckgo: site:example.com (api OR rest OR v1 OR v2 OR v3)

dorks.title: Juicy Extensions

dorks.bing: site:example.com (ext:log OR ext:txt OR ext:conf OR ext:ini OR ext:env OR ext:bak OR ext:backup)

dorks.title: High % inurl keywords
